type.name: Form
type.summary: Represents a form the type of which is either unknown, unsupported or unresolved. To convert an unknown form to a specific form use the appropriate extension method. Properties and methods provided by this class are available to all forms.

property.name: EditorId
property.summary: Gets or sets the Editor ID associated with this form.

property.name: FormId
property.summary: Gets the Form ID associated with this form.

method.name: HasTag
method.summary: Determines whether this form has been tagged with the specified text.

method.name: Tag
method.summary: Tags this form with the specified text.

method.name: AsAlch
method.summary: Converts this form to a Potion form or returns null if this form is not a Potion form.

method.name: AsAmmo
method.summary: Converts this form to an Ammo form or returns null if this form is not an Ammo form.

method.name: AsArmo
method.summary: Converts this form to an Armor form or returns null if this form is not an Armor form.

method.name: AsCobj
method.summary: Converts this form to a Constructible Object form or returns null if this form is not a Constructible Object form.

method.name: AsColl
method.summary: Converts this form to a Collision Layer form or returns null if this form is not a Collision Layer form.

method.name: AsEnch
method.summary: Converts this form to an Enchantment form or returns null if this form is not an Enchantment form.

method.name: AsEqup
method.summary: Converts this form to an Equipment Type form or returns null if this form is not an Equipment Type form.

method.name: AsExpl
method.summary: Converts this form to an Explosion form or returns null if this form is not an Explosion form.

method.name: AsFlst
method.summary: Converts this form to a Form List form or returns null if this form is not a Form List form.

method.name: AsGlob
method.summary: Converts this form to a Global Variable form or returns null if this form is not a Global Variable form.

method.name: AsGmst
method.summary: Converts this form to a Game Setting form or returns null if this form is not a Game Setting form.

method.name: AsImgs
method.summary: Converts this form to a Image Space form or returns null if this form is not an Image Space form.

method.name: AsIpds
method.summary: Converts this form to a Impact Data Set form or returns null if this form is not an Impact Data Set form.

method.name: AsKywd
method.summary: Converts this form to a Keyword form or returns null if this form is not a Keyword form.

method.name: AsLigh
method.summary: Converts this form to a Light form or returns null if this form is not a Light form.

method.name: AsMatt
method.summary: Converts this form to a Material form or returns null if this form is not a Material form.

method.name: AsMgef
method.summary: Converts this form to a Magic Effect form or returns null if this form is not a Magic Effect form.

method.name: AsProj
method.summary: Converts this form to a Projectile form or returns null if this form is not a Projectile form.

method.name: AsRace
method.summary: Converts this form to a Race form or returns null if this form is not a Race form.

method.name: AsRfct
method.summary: Converts this form to a Visual Effect form or returns null if this form is not a Visual Effect form.

method.name: AsSndr
method.summary: Converts this form to a Sound form or returns null if this form is not a Sound form.

method.name: AsSpel
method.summary: Converts this form to a Spell form or returns null if this form is not a Spell form.

method.name: AsSpgd
method.summary: Converts this form to a Shader Particle Geometry form or returns null if this form is not a Shader Particle Geometry form.

method.name: AsStat
method.summary: Converts this form to a Static form or returns null if this form is not a Static form.

method.name: AsTxst
method.summary: Converts this form to a Texture Set form or returns null if this form is not a Texture Set form.

method.name: AsWeap
method.summary: Converts this form to a Weapon form or returns null if this form is not a Weapon form.

method.name: AsWthr
method.summary: Converts this form to a Weather form or returns null if this form is not a Weather form.

remarks.p: When a variable refers to an unknown or generic form it means that only the common form properties and methods are available. In order to access all properties of the form the variable must be cast to the specific form using the appropriate extension method.
Unknow or generic forms can be retrieved via the helper method Forms.Find() or by iterating a mixed such as the collection of forms associated with a Form List form.

Unsupported forms are forms that have been loaded but the appliaction does not know anything about such form. Unsupported forms can be assigned to properties of supported forms or added to mixed . Unsupported forms cannot be converted to a specific form.

Unresolved forms are threaded the same way unsupported forms are treated, except that their Editor ID is always null. Unresolved forms come about from references to forms that do not exist due to an error in a plugin, or because the tool deliberately skipped these forms while loading plugin. Saving plugin that reference unresolved forms will produce a warning, but will work as intended as long as the form really exists.
